00033     // A * x
00042     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00043     viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00044                                 const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00045                                 viennacl::op_prod > prod_impl(const viennacl::coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & mat, 
00046                                                               const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00047                                                               unsigned int NUM_THREADS)
00048     {
00049       return viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00050                                const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00051                                viennacl::op_prod >(mat, vec);
00052     }
00053     
00054     //namespace {
00064       template<class TYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00065       void prod_impl(const viennacl::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT> & mat, 
00066                      const viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00067                            viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & result,
00068                       unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00069       {
00070         assert(mat.size1() == result.size());
00071         assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());
00072         result.clear();
00073         
00074         //std::cout << "prod(coordinate_matrix" << ALIGNMENT << ", vector) called with internal_nnz=" << mat.internal_nnz() << std::endl;
00075         
00076         //unsigned int thread_num = 128;
00077         unsigned int thread_num = 1;
00078         if (viennacl::ocl::device().type() == CL_DEVICE_TYPE_CPU)
00079         {
00080           thread_num = 1;
00081         }
00082         unsigned int pos = 0;
00083         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle12());
00084         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00085         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00086         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00087         //viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result2.handle());
00088         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.nnz());
00089         //viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.size());
00090         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(unsigned int)*thread_num);
00091         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(TYPE)*thread_num);
00092         
00093         viennacl::linalg::kernels::coordinate_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.start1D(thread_num, thread_num);
00094         //clFinish(device().queue());
00095         
00096         //result += result2;
00097 
00098       }
00099     //};
00100 
00101   } //namespace linalg

00105     //v = A * x, TODO: Check for self-assignment
00110     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00111     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00112     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00113     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator=(const viennacl::vector_expression< const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00114                                                                                           const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00115                                                                                           viennacl::op_prod> & proxy) 
00116     {
00117       // check for the special case x = A * x
00118       if (proxy.get_lhs().handle() == this->handle())
00119       {
00120         viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_rhs().size());
00121         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00122         *this = result;
00123         return *this;
00124       }
00125       else
00126       {
00127         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00128         return *this;
00129       }
00130       return *this;
00131     }
00132 
00133     //v += A * x
00138     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00139     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00140     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00141     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+=(const vector_expression< const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00142                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00143                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00144     {
00145       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00146       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00147       *this += result;
00148       return *this;
00149     }
00150 
00155     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00156     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00157     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00158     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-=(const vector_expression< const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00159                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00160                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00161     {
00162       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00163       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00164       *this -= result;
00165       return *this;
00166     }

00168     
00169     //free functions:
00174     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00175     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00176     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00177     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+(const vector_expression< const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00178                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00179                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00180     {
00181       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00182       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00183       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00184       result += *this;
00185       return result;
00186     }
00187 
00192     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00193     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00194     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00195     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-(const vector_expression< const coordinate_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00196                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00197                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00198     {
00199       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00200       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00201       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00202       result = *this - result;
00203       return result;
00204     }
